events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product in the shipment.
A customer support representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can start processing your refund?
Sure, here is the photo of the item I received, and my order number is 12345XYZ. Looking forward to your help.
Thanks for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate how quickly you’re handling this.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the funds back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Received the refund today, thanks for your help. Everything is sorted now.
We are closing this case now, glad to have resolved your refund issue successfully. Have a great day!
